includedAssets.title: Ice Age
includedAssets.synopsis: A motley prehistoric crew get animated in the hilarious CG smash that introduced us to Sid the Sloth, Manfred the Mammoth, Scrat the acorn-obsessed whatever-he-is, and a whole host of other colourful characters trying to cope with the oncoming ice age. "They came. They thawed. They conquered" went the tagline - and so they did, with three hit sequels to prove it.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Global cooling forces a woolly mammoth, a silly sloth and a sabre-toothed tiger into an unlikely herd. Outstanding animation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A motley prehistoric crew get animated in the hilarious CG smash that introduced us to Sid the Sloth, Manfred the Mammoth, Scrat the acorn-obsessed whatever-he-is, and a whole host of other colourful characters trying to cope with the oncoming ice age. "They came. They thawed. They conquered" went the tagline - and so they did, with three hit sequels to prove it.

includedAssets.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
includedAssets.synopsis: Sid the sloth, Manny the mammoth and Diego the sabre-toothed tiger are back for the sequel to 2002's animated hit Ice Age. When their glacier home begins to melt, the prehistoric posse must beat the floods by taking an eventful journey to safer ground. Scrat the acorn-obsessed squirrel-rat steals the show once again, but the torrent of visual and verbal gags makes this another highly entertaining post-Jurassic lark.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: They've survived the deep freeze, but can Sid the sloth and Manny the mammoth escape the great meltdown? Frosty animated fun.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sid the sloth, Manny the mammoth and Diego the sabre-toothed tiger are back for the sequel to 2002's animated hit Ice Age. When their glacier home begins to melt, the prehistoric posse must beat the floods by taking an eventful journey to safer ground. Scrat the acorn-obsessed squirrel-rat steals the show once again, but the torrent of visual and verbal gags makes this another highly entertaining post-Jurassic lark.

includedAssets.title: Ice Age: Dawn Of The Dinosaurs
includedAssets.synopsis: The prehistoric pals find themselves face-to-face with hungry dinos after Sid the Sloth adopts a brood of baby T-Rexes. Thrilling animation.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The prehistoric pals find themselves face-to-face with hungry dinos after Sid the Sloth adopts a brood of baby T-Rexes. Thrilling animation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The prehistoric pals find themselves face-to-face with hungry dinos after Sid the Sloth adopts a brood of baby T-Rexes. Thrilling animation.

includedAssets.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
includedAssets.synopsis: Prehistoric pals Manny, Sid and Diego become separated from their families when their glacier splits in two. A fourth adventure with Ray Romano.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Prehistoric pals Manny, Sid and Diego become separated from their families when their glacier splits in two. A fourth adventure with Ray Romano.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Prehistoric pals Manny, Sid and Diego become separated from their families when their glacier splits in two. A fourth adventure with Ray Romano.

includedAssets.title: Ice Age Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Sid the sloth, Manny the mammoth and Diego the sabre-toothed tiger join forces to survive the Ice Age, making new friends, dangerous enemies and incredible discoveries along the way. Ray Romano, John Leguizamo and Denis Leary lend their voices to this smash-hit family animation franchise.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sid the sloth, Manny the mammoth and Diego the tiger join forces to survive the Ice Age. Animation with Ray Romano, John Leguizamo and Denis Leary.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sid the sloth, Manny the mammoth and Diego the sabre-toothed tiger join forces to survive the Ice Age, making new friends, dangerous enemies and incredible discoveries along the way. Ray Romano, John Leguizamo and Denis Leary lend their voices to this smash-hit family animation franchise.

includedIn.title: Ice Age
includedIn.synopsis: Sid the sloth, Manny the mammoth and Diego the sabre-toothed tiger join forces to survive the Ice Age. The unconventional herd must return a lost baby to her father and avoid a meltdown that threatens to flood their home, before discovering a secret world of dinosaurs and taking on an evil pirate.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Sid the sloth, Manny the mammoth and Diego the sabre-toothed tiger join forces to survive the Ice Age.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Sid the sloth, Manny the mammoth and Diego the sabre-toothed tiger join forces to survive the Ice Age. The unconventional herd must return a lost baby to her father and avoid a meltdown that threatens to flood their home, before discovering a secret world of dinosaurs and taking on an evil pirate.
